remarks: A continuous function is continuous at all points.  Theorem 7.2(g) of [Munkres] p. 107.  (Contributed by NM, 15-May-2007.)  (Proof shortened by Mario Carneiro, 21-Aug-2015.)
statement:
cncnp $p |- ( ( J e. ( TopOn ` X ) /\ K e. ( TopOn ` Y ) ) -> ( F e. ( J Cn K ) <-> ( F : X --> Y /\ A. x e. X F e. ( ( J CnP K ) ` x ) ) ) ) $.
$d F x $.
$d J x $.
$d K x $.
$d X x $.
$d Y x $.
